languages.text: "Я не разбираюсь в кораблях, но когда я допрашивал на Футфоле капитанов о "Бессердечном", они чуть ли слюной не давились, расписывая его достоинства".
"I'm no expert on ships, but when I questioned the captains on Footfall about the Heartless, they were almost salivating as they listed its virtues."
languages.original_text: "Я не разбираюсь в кораблях, но когда я допрашивал на Футфоле капитанов о "Бессердечном", они чуть ли слюной не давились, расписывая его достоинства".

"I'm no expert on ships, but when I questioned the captains on Footfall about the Heartless, they were almost salivating as they listed its virtues."

languages.text: «No soy un experto en naves, pero, cuando pregunté a los capitanes de Paso sobre la Desalmada, solo les faltaba salivar mientras explicaban sus muchas virtudes».
languages.original_text: "I'm no expert on ships, but when I questioned the captains on Footfall about the Heartless, they were almost salivating as they listed its virtues."

traits.locale_text: «No soy un experto en naves, pero, cuando pregunté a los capitanes de Paso sobre la Desalmada, solo les faltaba salivar mientras explicaban sus muchas virtudes».

languages.text: “我并不是虚空舰方面的专家，但当我在落脚港询问无心号的情况时，其他船长列举了很多优点，他们的口水几乎都要流出来了。”
languages.original_text: "I'm no expert on ships, but when I questioned the captains on Footfall about the Heartless, they were almost salivating as they listed its virtues."

traits.locale_text: “我并不是虚空舰方面的专家，但当我在落脚港询问无心号的情况时，其他船长列举了很多优点，他们的口水几乎都要流出来了。”

languages.text: « Je ne suis pas expert en vaisseaux, mais quand j'ai parlé du Sans-Cœur aux capitaines de passage à Castel, ils n'en finissaient plus de dresser la liste de ses qualités. »
languages.original_text: "I'm no expert on ships, but when I questioned the captains on Footfall about the Heartless, they were almost salivating as they listed its virtues."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne suis pas expert en vaisseaux, mais quand j'ai parlé du Sans-Cœur aux capitaines de passage à Castel, ils n'en finissaient plus de dresser la liste de ses qualités. »

languages.text: 「私は船の専門家ではありませんが、ハートレスについてフットフォールのキャプテンらに質問したとき、彼らはその美点を列挙するにつれて、ほとんどよだれが出ていました」
languages.original_text: "I'm no expert on ships, but when I questioned the captains on Footfall about the Heartless, they were almost salivating as they listed its virtues."

traits.locale_text: 「私は船の専門家ではありませんが、ハートレスについてフットフォールのキャプテンらに質問したとき、彼らはその美点を列挙するにつれて、ほとんどよだれが出ていました」

languages.text: "Gemi uzmanı değilimdir ancak Binliman'daki kaptanlara Taşkalp'i sorduğumda iyi taraflarını anlatırken salya akıttıklarını gördüğümü söyleyebilirim."
languages.original_text: "I'm no expert on ships, but when I questioned the captains on Footfall about the Heartless, they were almost salivating as they listed its virtues."

traits.locale_text: "Gemi uzmanı değilimdir ancak Binliman'daki kaptanlara Taşkalp'i sorduğumda iyi taraflarını anlatırken salya akıttıklarını gördüğümü söyleyebilirim."

languages.text: "Ich bin kein Experte für Schiffe, aber als ich die Captains auf Footfall nach der Heartless fragte, haben sie beinahe ehrfürchtig ihre Stärken aufgezählt."
languages.original_text: "I'm no expert on ships, but when I questioned the captains on Footfall about the Heartless, they were almost salivating as they listed its virtues."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin {mf|kein Experte|keine Expertin} für Schiffe, aber als ich die Captains auf Footfall nach der Heartless fragte, haben sie beinahe ehrfürchtig ihre Stärken aufgezählt."

languages.original_text: "I'm no expert on ships, but when I questioned the captains on Footfall about the Heartless, they were almost salivating as they listed its virtues."
